p: Recently, mutations in three novel genes, that is, the vacuolar protein sorting 35 homolog ( VPS35), eukaryotic translation initiation factor 4 gamma 1 ( EIF4G1), and dnaJ homolog subfamily C member 13 ( DNAJC13), were proposed to cause late onset autosomal dominant inheritance and need further replication to be confirmed [ 26â€“ 28].
